full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO'I KHA BSKONGS KYI CHO GA NYES PA KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (ZHES DPAL LDAN LHA MO 'DOD @009A *, ,KHAMS DBANG PHYUG MA'I THUGS DAM BSKANGS PA DANG, 'GAL RKYEN GYI 'TSUB LHONG SOGS ZHI BA LA MCHOG TU BSNGAGS PA, SROG CHAGS RGYU SKONGS DANG, BAM SKONGS KYI CHO GA NYES PA KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SPYIR YANG SNYIGS MAR SPYOD PA'I DBANG GIS MA MO MKHA' 'GRO 'KHYAGS PA'I 'TSUB LHONGS KYIS BSKYED PA'I NAD GDON SHIN TU MANG PA DANG, LHAG PAR LA SNGA PHYIR NYE BSKOR DU NAD RIMS RIGS MI 'DRA BA MANG DU CHED CING, ,MI SHES PA'I LTAS MTSAN SNA TSOGS BYUNG BA, BSRUNG MA 'KHU LDOG GI RNAM PA YIN PA DANG, BSKANGS BSHAGS MANG DU BTANG NA LEGS PA'I MTSAN MA KUN RTOGS KYI RI MOR SHAR BA BZHIN, LAG LEN DU BSTAR SKABS, ,^ BTZUN GZUGS DHARMA BADZRA GYIS BAM SKONGS KYI CHO GA LHO BRAG GRUB CHEN LAS KYI RDO RJE'I GSUNG LA TSIGS PHRAD CUNG ZAD BGSYUR CING, ,LAG LEN GSAL BAR BGYIS TE, DBEN NA BDE CHEN CHOS GLING DU KLAG CHOG CHU 'BABS SU BKOD PA 'DIS KYANG MI MTHUN NYER 'TSE THAMS CAD ZHI ZHING, ,'DOD KHAMS DBANG MO DGYES PAS 'PHRIN LAS RNAM BZHI LHUN GYIS GRUB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
